column5: Last year there was a board that had fishing reports from Eagle lake, LOTW, Lac Seul, and surrounding areas from various fishing lodges. I can't find the board this year. Has this been discontinued? There were great reports from Andy Meyers, Silver Water Wheel, Evergreen, Crawfords, Witch Bay and many others.
[font color=green size=3][b]I've was told that justfishontario.com went under over the winter, the owner is rumored to be guiding at a well known lodge this summer.
justfishontario.com was probably the site you are mentioning. The site has been revised, and the fishing report section is gone.
I would try fishinfo.com this will help you reports from all the areas you asked about and more.
